channel.title: Dividend Investing on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Dividend Investing on FinanClub

item.title: VTRS
item.description: score:-14 Chances: Viatris, a generic drugmaker, serves patients and customers in over 165 countries with a diverse global business. Viatris’ potential divestitures and new multiple sclerosis treatment could contribute to positive sentiment. Viatris is a stock of interest among the dividend investing community due to its stable line of business.

item.title: MPW
item.description: score:111 Chances: Medical Properties Trust has announced the sale of a significant interest in Steward Health Care System’s credit facility, which could indicate strategic financial moves. Despite the pitfalls, there might be investment opportunities for dividend investors in Medical Properties Trust due to the company’s high yield.

item.title: MRO
item.description: score:10 Chances: Marathon Oil Corporation reported positive adjusted free cash flow of $531 million despite spending $623 million in capital and exploratory expenditures. The reported net income of $287 million for the second quarter and strong production profile suggest a chance for improved financial results.
